snippet: Forces loyal to Libya’s recognized government on Saturday carried out airstrikes near the eastern oil ports of Ras Lanuf and Es-Sider to stop an advance by a rival militia, officials said.
abstract: Forces loyal to Libya's recognized government clash over control of country's oil ports in the east.
lead_paragraph: Forces loyal to Libya’s recognized government on Saturday carried out airstrikes near the eastern oil ports of Ras Lanuf and Es-Sider to stop an advance by a rival militia, officials said.

headline.main: Libya: Rival Forces Clash Over Eastern Oil Ports
headline.print_headline: Libya: Rival Forces Clash Over Eastern Oil Ports
